entry.title: WATERMELON MARGARITA
entry.content:
This margarita is perfect addition to you Cinco De Mayo celebration if you're looking for something refreshing, fun, and Non-Alcoholic.Â Follow the instructions below to make yours today!

Cook Time: 5 Minutes

Â 

INGREDIENTS:

  • 16oz water
  • Lime juice
  • Salt for the glass rim
  • 1 scoop of SEEQ Watermelon
  • 2-5 Mint leaves (optional)
  • Ice
  • Optional: 2oz Tequila Blanco

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Start by combining lime juice, watermelon juice, 2 mint leaves, water, SEEQ protein in a blender or shaker.
  2. Shake the blender bottle gently to mix the ingredients together or use a blender to make a frozen marg!Â 
  3. After shaking or blending,Â run one of the lime wedge around the rim of your choice of glass then dip into salt
  4. Add ice to your glass (if you're making a frozen marg skip this step)
  5. Pour the marg mixture into a glassÂ and ake your drink fancy by adding a wedge of lime. Throw in a few mint leaves on top of the drink.
  6. Enjoy your delicious Watermelon Marg ðŸ¥‚Â
